declarations.name: FormAssociatedElement
declarations.summary: Form-associated base class for custom elements
declarations.description:
Base class for form-associated custom elements (FACE).

Provides form integration capabilities for custom elements,
allowing them to participate in HTML form submission and validation.

```typescript

members.name: form
members.description: Get the form this element is associated with

members.name: willValidate
members.description: Check if the element will be validated

members.name: checkValidity
members.description: Check if the form is valid

members.name: reportValidity
members.description: Report form validity to the user

members.name: formResetCallback
members.description: Called when the form is reset

declarations.name: DemoButton
declarations.summary: Buttons represent actions that are available to the user
declarations.description: Comprehensive button component demonstrating all CEM features.

members.name: pill
members.description: Draws the button with a pill shape (fully rounded)

members.name: loading
members.description: Shows a loading spinner and disables interaction

members.name: type
members.description: The button type for form submission

members.name: name
members.description: The button's name when used in forms

members.name: value
members.description: The button's value when used in forms

members.name: click
members.description: Simulates a click on the button

members.name: checkValidity
members.description: Checks form validity and reports any validation errors

members.name: reportValidity
members.description: Reports form validity to the user

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The button's theme variant

attributes.name: appearance
attributes.description: The button's visual appearance style

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The button's size

attributes.name: pill
attributes.description: Draws the button with a pill shape (fully rounded)

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the button

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Shows a loading spinner and disables interaction

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The button type for form submission

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The button's name when used in forms

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The button's value when used in forms

events.name: click
events.description: Emitted when the button is clicked

events.name: focus
events.description: Emitted when the button gains focus

events.name: blur
events.description: Emitted when the button loses focus

slots.name: start
slots.description: Content placed before the label (e.g., an icon)

slots.name: end
slots.description: Content placed after the label (e.g., an icon)

cssParts.name: start
cssParts.description: The container that wraps the start slot

cssParts.name: end
cssParts.description: The container that wraps the end slot

demos.description:
Full cross-component example demonstrating:
- Form submission with demo-button (submit/reset types)
- Input validation with demo-input
- Layout structure with demo-card (header/footer slots)
- Loading state during async operations
Loading spinner states across all variants, sizes, and appearances

Demonstrates the different interactive states and sizes:
- **Sizes**: Small, medium, and large variants
- **Disabled**: Cannot be interacted with
- **Pill**: Fully rounded corners for alternate styling

Comprehensive demonstration of all color variants for the demo-button component:
- **Neutral**: Default gray variant
- **Brand**: Primary brand color
- **Success**: Positive actions
- **Warning**: Caution actions
- **Danger**: Destructive actions

Cross-component demo showing demo-button with demo-icon integration:
- Icons before label (start slot)
- Icons after label (end slot)
- Icon-only buttons with aria-label

declarations.name: DemoCard
declarations.summary: Cards contain content and actions about a single subject
declarations.description: A card component for grouping related content.

slots.name: header
slots.summary: Content for the card header (e.g., title, actions)

slots.name: footer
slots.summary: Content for the card footer (e.g., actions, metadata)

demos.description: Using demo-card to display article content with metadata in the footer.
A simple demo-card with header and body content.
Multiple demo-cards arranged in a responsive grid layout.
Demonstrates demo-card with header, body, and footer slots.

declarations.name: DemoDebugField
declarations.summary: Debuggable form field combining FACE and mixin patterns
declarations.description:
A form-associated element with logging capabilities.

Demonstrates combining a base class (FormAssociatedElement) with a
mixin (LoggingMixin) to create an element with both form integration
and debug logging capabilities.

members.name: styles

events.name: change
events.description: Emitted when the input loses focus

events.name: focus
events.description: Emitted when the field gains focus

events.name: blur
events.description: Emitted when the field loses focus

declarations.name: DemoField
declarations.description:
A form-associated custom element demonstrating FACE pattern.

This element extends FormAssociatedElement to participate in HTML forms,
providing form validation, submission, and reset capabilities.

members.name: styles
name
members.description: The field name for form submission

events.name: change
events.description: Emitted when the input loses focus

declarations.name: DemoIcon
declarations.summary: Displays SVG icons with customizable appearance
declarations.description: An icon component for displaying simple SVG icons.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the icon to display

members.name: label
members.description: Accessible label for the icon (required for accessibility)

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the icon to display

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Accessible label for the icon (required for accessibility)

cssProperties.name: --demo-icon-size
cssProperties.description: Width and height of the icon

demos.description: Demonstrates demo-icon with different colors using CSS color property.
Showcases all available icon names in demo-icon component.
Interactive demo-icon elements that respond to user interaction.
Demonstrates demo-icon at different sizes using CSS.

declarations.name: DemoInputEvent
declarations.description: Custom event for demo-input component value changes.

declarations.name: DemoInput
declarations.summary: Text input with label, validation, and accessibility features
declarations.description: A comprehensive text input component with validation and helper text.

members.name: value
members.description: The current value of the input

members.name: placeholder
members.description: Placeholder text shown when the input is empty

members.name: required
members.description: Marks the input as required for form validation

members.name: name
members.description: The input's name when used in forms

members.name: helperText
members.description: Helper text displayed below the input

members.name: errorText
members.description: Error text displayed when the input is in an error state

members.name: error
members.description: Shows the input in an error state

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The input's label text

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The current value of the input

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Placeholder text shown when the input is empty

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The input type

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the input

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Marks the input as required for form validation

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Makes the input read-only

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The input's name when used in forms

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Autocomplete hint for the browser

attributes.name: helper-text
attributes.description: Helper text displayed below the input

attributes.name: error-text
attributes.description: Error text displayed when the input is in an error state

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: Shows the input in an error state

events.name: demo-input
events.description: Emitted when the input value changes (on input event)

events.name: demo-change
events.description: Emitted when the input value is committed (on change event)

cssProperties.name: --demo-input-error-border-color
cssProperties.description: Border color when in error state

demos.description: Demonstrates autocomplete attribute for browser autofill suggestions.
A simple demo-input with label and placeholder.
Demonstrates helper text and error text in demo-input.
Demonstrates disabled and readonly states of demo-input.
Demonstrates different input types: text, email, password, number, tel, and url.
Demonstrates form validation with required fields and error states.

declarations.name: DemoLogger
declarations.description:
A debug utility element that demonstrates mixin usage.

This element uses the LoggingMixin to add lifecycle logging
and debug utilities to track element behavior.

members.name: styles
logMessage
members.description: Log a test message to demonstrate logging

cssProperties.name: --demo-spinner-size
cssProperties.description: Size of the spinner (width and height)

cssProperties.name: --demo-spinner-track-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the spinner track (background circle)

demos.description: A basic loading spinner demonstration.
Demonstrates demo-spinner inside buttons for loading states.
Demonstrates demo-spinner with different colors using CSS.
Demonstrates demo-spinner at different sizes using CSS.

declarations.name: LoggingMixin
declarations.summary: Provides lifecycle logging and debug utilities
declarations.description:
Mixin that adds logging capabilities to custom elements.
